note.p: Birth: Dover Street, Piccadilly, London, England (25 January 1807)
Burial: Cole family vault, St Macartan's Cathedral, Enniskillen
Education: Harrow School; Christ Church, Oxford University (1826)

Career: Travelled in Europe with Sir Philip Egerton (1830), met Louis Agassiz; member of the Orange Order, first imperial Grand Master of the Order world-wide (1886); MP for Fermanagh (1831-1840); Honorary Colonel, Fermanagh Militia (1875-death); Honorary Doctor of Civil Law, Oxford University; Honorary LLD, Universities of Dublin and Durham; collection of fossil fish transferred to British Museum for Â£3500 (1883);
Memberships: FGS (1828); MRIA (1846); President Royal Geological Society of Ireland (1865)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1886 vol 41 pp ix-xi signed by R E
